CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(ForecastCategoryName) = "Omitted" , "Lost", IF( IsWon = TRUE , "Won", IF(RecordType.Name = "Renewal Self Service", "Renewal Self Service", IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name , "Renewal"), IF(AND( Has_Compelling_Event__c = TRUE, Has_Budget__c = TRUE, Has_Verbal_Approval__c = TRUE, Docs_in_Review_legal__c = TRUE), "Renewal Forecasted to Close Deal", IF( Management_Proforma_Deal__c = TRUE, "Renewal Proforma Deal", "Renewal Upside Deal" ) ), IF(AND( Has_Compelling_Event__c = TRUE, Has_Budget__c = TRUE, Has_Verbal_Approval__c = TRUE, Docs_in_Review_legal__c = TRUE), "Forecasted to Close Deal", IF( Management_Proforma_Deal__c = TRUE, "Proforma Deal", "Upside Deal" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Categories for management forecast: Forecasted to Close Deals Proforma Deals Upside Deals Renewal Deals Won Deals
CustomField.label: Finance Upside Criteria
